alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:43AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Columbia and northeastern Sauk Counties through 530 AM CDT... At 442 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Baraboo, or near Baraboo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baraboo, Lake Wisconsin, Lodi, Lake Delton, Poynette, West Baraboo, Arlington, Bluffview, North Freedom, Merrimac, Rock Springs, Harmony Grove, Okee, Interstate 90/94 Interchange,, Devils Lake St Park and the Sauk County Fairgrounds. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 91 and 97, and between mile markers 106 and 108. Interstate 39 between mile markers 85 and 86. Interstate 39/90/94 between mile markers 109 and 110, and between mile markers 112 and 123. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 213 and 223. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
